snippet.title: Tips on recording for radio
snippet.description:
Teachers' resources / 19 February 2010
… to a PC or Mac using a USB connection. You will also need to get a CF (compact flash) card to record onto. Machines may come with a 256MB card…

snippet.title: Factfile: The PlayStation 3
snippet.description:
Technology / 10 November 2006
… comes with a flash memory card reader that can handle memory sticks, compact flash or SD cards. This is hidden under a flap on the front left…

snippet.title: Nintendo reveals its Revolution
snippet.description:
Technology / 17 May 2005
… be decided. The Revolution will play DVDs, have built-in wi-fi, an SD memory card slot, and 512Mb of flash memory. But Mr Iwata was coy about…
